content: that s where we connect join thousands of like-minded knitters and subscribe to the explorers weekly skeinwalker s free newsletter newsletter subscribers get a free cowl pattern as a thank you for subscribing and yes that s another crystal-clear knitting pattern with lots of supporting materials subscriber-only discounts for skeinwalker patterns bundles ebooks skeinwalker yarns exclusive skeinwalker news and sneak peeks inspiration and behind-the-scenes tidbits that i don t share anywhere else one email per week no strings attached no spam just beautiful knitting click and subscribe now and get your exclusive free pattern in the process 12 lagunîs skeinwalker © 2025 skeinwalker share connect and explore knitting is an endless and fun exploration right keep the fun going and connect with me i d love to know more about you and to see the skeinwalker projects you re working on share and spread the word thank you so much for choosing a skeinwalker pattern and for letting me be part of your knitting journey please share pictures of your skeinwalker projects on any social-media platform you re on and tag me when doing so it makes all the difference to me by making my designs more visible and to our dear fellow knitters and explorers by showing what s possible with knitting connect click or tap the icons below to connect with me you ll find me as skeinwalker pretty much everywhere explore even more are you ready to explore even more so am i - register to receive the explorers weekly skeinwalker s free newsletter and get news inspiration sneak peeks and exclusive promotions that i don t share anywhere else register and you ll receive a free skeinwalker pattern as a welcome gift explore dare create skeinwalker lagunîs 13 © 2025 skeinwalker
